With over 40 sports and a calendar crammed with sporting events, your life in NUS is as adrenalin-packed as you make it to be! Whether you are a muscle-ripping national athlete or a couch potato looking to lose a few pounds, NUS has just the sports for you ranging from mega-competitive to ultra-recreational.

NUS has a wide variety of sports facilities to cater to your different sporting interests, including a rock climbing wall, tennis courts and swimming pools. Following is the breif description on some of facilities available:
 1 x Dance Studio (Closed from 1 Apr 2015 onwards due to redevelopment works)
 5 x Multi-Purpose Sports Halls (MPSH 1, 2, 4, 5, 6)
 5 x Squash Courts (Closed from 1 Apr 2015 onwards due to redevelopment works)
 1 x Rock Climbing Gym (Closed from 1 Apr 2015 onwards due to redevelopment works)
 1 x Strength and Conditioning Lab (Closed from 1 Apr 2015 onwards due to redevelopment works)
 1 x Students Gym @ MPSH 3
 1 x Bukit Timah Campus (BTC) Gym - Opened to BTC staff and students only.
 1 x Archery Range
 4 x Basketball Courts
 2 x Handball Courts
 4 x Multi-Purpose Courts
 4 x Netball Courts
 1 x Sepak Takraw Court
 13 x Tennis Courts and 2 Practice Walls
 2 x Volleyball Courts
 1 x Certified Athletics Arena
 1 x Soccer Field
 2 x Multi-Purpose Fields
 1 x Olympic-size Swimming Pool (Closed from 1 Apr 2015 onwards due to redevelopment works)
 1 x Instructional Swimming Pool (Closed from 1 Apr 2015 onwards due to redevelopment works)
